oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Non-poisonous means for reducing rodent pest problems in organic pig farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lodal, J.
Knorr, M.
Leirs, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The results indicate factors that are practicable as preventive measures against rodents. Preventive measures are to be considered when planning and laying out the fields for the pigs and when running the farm as well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lodal, J.; Knorr, M. and Leirs, H. (2003) Non-poisonous means for reducing rodent pest problems in organic pig farming. DARCOFenews (4).
